x10.matrix.dist

Class DistMatrix

  • x10.matrix.Matrix
    • x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix

  • public class DistMatrix
extends Matrix
    Declaration: DistMatrix{this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).grid.M==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).M, this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).grid.N==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix)., } extends x10.matrix.Matrix.
    This class provides an abstraction for distributed matrix blocks, which
can be either dense or sparse matrix blocks.
    

    • 







    

  •

      Declaration: x10$matrix$dist$DistMatrix$$this$x10$matrix$dist$DistMatrix(): x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix{self==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix)}.
This class provides an abstraction for distributed matrix blocks, which
can be either dense or sparse matrix blocks.

        DistMatrix
        

        public DistMatrix(Grid g)
        

        Declaration: this(x10.matrix.block.Grid): x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix{self.M==g.M, self.N==g.N, self.grid==g}.
        Construct distributed block matrix using specified partitioning.
Partitioned blocks are uniquely distributed among
all places.  Because there is no block type specified,
no memory space is allocated for matrix data.

        makeSparse
        

        public static DistMatrix makeSparse(Grid gp,
                    x10.lang.Double nzd)
        

        Declaration: makeSparse(gp:x10.matrix.block.Grid,nzd:x10.lang.Double): x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix{self.M==gp.M, self.N==gp.N}.
        Make a distributed block matrix based on specified partitioning and sparsity.
All blocks are instances of sparse matrix block and each block is
created with the same sparsity.
        

        Parameters:
        gp - Matrix partitioning
        nzd - nonzero sparsity of each block

        mult
        

        public Matrix mult(Matrix A,
          Matrix B,
          x10.lang.Boolean plus)
        

        Declaration: mult(A:x10.matrix.Matrix{self.M==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).M},B:x10.matrix.Matrix{self.M==A.N, self.N==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).N},plus:x10.lang.Boolean): x10.matrix.Matrix{self==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix), this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).grid.M==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).M, this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).grid.N==this(:x10.matrix.dist.DistMatrix).N}.
        Not implemented.
This method is designed to perform matrix multiplication,
returning this +=A * B if plus is true, else
this  = A * B

        This class provides an abstraction for distributed matrix blocks, which
can be either dense or sparse matrix blocks.
